title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: When adding a localization key, it cannot be left blank. If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in a chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Leave the key blank in the properties file, but provide a valid value. 2. Add the localization key and observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
